Package org.netbeans.modules.xml.xdm.visitor

Visitors for operations over the XDM such as generating XPath expressions, calculating document position and finding elements by position.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XMLNodeVisitor
    A visitor for the set of text related nodes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChildVisitor
    This class provides the ability to walk nodes which have children.
    CompareVisitor
    Does the comparison for only the needed methods for a given node with its target.

    EndPositionFinderVisitor  
    FindNamespaceVisitor  
    FindVisitor  
    FlushVisitor  
    HashNamespaceResolver  
    MergeVisitor
    This class provides a way to merge two trees.

    NodeByPositionVisitor  
    PathFromRootVisitor  
    PositionFinderVisitor  
    PrintVisitor  
    Utils
    Utils.java Created on November 16, 2004, 3:21 PM
    XPathFinder
    Finder for nodes from a document using arbitrary XPath expression.

Package org.netbeans.modules.xml.xdm.visitor Description

Visitors for operations over the XDM such as generating XPath expressions, calculating document position and finding elements by position.
